query:
UPDATE user_profiles up
JOIN user_credentials uc ON up.user_id = uc.user_id
SET up.perfil_ativo = 'medico', up.is_medico = 1
WHERE uc.username = 'leticia.uzeika';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2eJNWYGY92vZU3w.root --database TyeFpW5ykZHTuZXuk6iMG7 --execute UPDATE user_profiles up
JOIN user_credentials uc ON up.user_id = uc.user_id
SET up.perfil_ativo = 'medico', up.is_medico = 1
WHERE uc.username = 'leticia.uzeika';
